item.description:
With a pivotal election only days away, patriotic Americans everywhere are doing their civic duty to prepare... by playing games of course!  Come join Ryan for good ol' team fun (red vs. blue?) where we play a mix of games that utilize the most democratic game mechanic there is: voting.

In The Resistance, players engage in an epic struggle of Rebellion vs. Empire as they attempt to uncover a government conspiracy and overthrow the shackles of oppression to earn their freedom... but with a twist.  Requiring thinking and deduction, this game is perfect for strategy fans.

In Democrazy, players in a pretend Congress haggle with each other to pass zany laws that only benefit themselves and make them crazy wealthy.  Wait, I'm still talking about a game right?  With plenty of humor and downright silliness, this game is suited for party game fans.

Got a game with a voting mechanic?  Bring it and who knows, maybe the group will vote on it to see if we play it! (har har har)

Uncle Sam wants you... to come to this meetup.  See you there! :-)

---

Food:

A pizza and some drinks will be provided.  Please bring additional snacks, drinks or alcohol to share with the group.

---

About the location:

This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises and the property should be child-friendly.  Look for Unit 901 since Meetup doesn't display addresses correctly! :-(

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: Rock the Vote
